nodes.text: This Sandcrawler was owned by the infamous Jawa dealer Wittin. It searched the Dune Sea of Tatooine for lost droids and other items deemed worth scavenging, and was feared by the locals. The sandcrawler was enclosed and heavily reinforced with additional armor to protect it from Krayt dragon attacks. In 0 BBY, it was destroyed by the Imperial Stormtrooper unit Desert Sands due to the unit trying to find the Death Star plans.
